contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Lulu|lulu|LULU}} '''Lulu''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} ==Companies== * [[Lulu (company)]], an online e-books and print self-publishing platform, distributor, and retailer * [[LuLu]], an early automobile manufacturer * [[Lulu Hypermarket]], a retail chain in Asia * [[Lululemon Athletica]] or simply Lulu, a British Columbia-based athletic apparel company ==Places== * [[Lulu Bay]], bay on Navassa Island in the Caribbean * [[Lulu Town]], town on Navassa Island in the Caribbean * [[Lulu Island]], an island which comprises most of Richmond, British Columbia, Canada * [[Lulu Roundabout]], in Manama, Bahrain * [[LuLu International Shopping Mall]] in Kochi ==Theater, film, opera== * The [[Lulu plays]] by Frank Wedekind, whose protagonist is named Lulu. Works based upon them include: ** [[Lulu (opera)|''Lulu'' (opera)]], an opera by Alban Berg ** [[Erdgeist (film)|''Erdgeist'' (film)]], a 1923 film by Leopold Jessner ** [[Pandora's Box (1929 film)|''Pandora's Box'' (1929 film)]], a film by Georg Wilhelm Pabst ** [[Lulu (1962 film)|''Lulu'' (1962 film)]], an Austrian film by Rolf Thiele ** [[Lulu (1980 film)|''Lulu'' (1980 film)]], a film directed by [[Walerian Borowczyk]] * [[Lulu (1914 film)|''Lulu'' (1914 film)]], an Italian film directed by Augusto Genina * [[Lulu (1918 film)|''Lulu'' (1918 film)]], a film directed by Michael Curtiz * [[Lulu (1953 film)|''Lulu'' (1953 film)]], a film directed by Fernando Cerchio * [[Lulu (1996 film)|''Lulu'' (1996 film)]], a film directed by Srinivas Krishna * [[Lulu (2002 film)|''Lulu'' (2002 film)]], a French film starring [[Jean-Pierre Kalfon]] * [[Lulu (2005 film)|''Lulu'' (2005 film)]], a Dutch film featuring [[Georgina Verbaan]] * [[Lulu (2006 film)|''Lulu'' (2006 film)]], a German TV film featuring [[Matthias SchweighÃ¶fer]] * ''Lulu'', an [[List of compositions by Friedrich Kuhlau|opera by Friedrich Kuhlau]] ==Other characters== * [[Lulu (Final Fantasy)|Lulu (''Final Fantasy'')]], a character in the ''Final Fantasy'' video game series * [[Lulu Spencer-Falconeri]], a fictional character on the soap opera ''General Hospital'' * [[Lelouch Lamperouge]] or Lulu, a character in the anime ''Code Geass'' * [[Little Lulu]], a comic strip character * Lulu Teruno, alias of Tellu, one of the [[Death Busters#Tellu|Death Busters]] from the ''Sailor Moon'' metaseries * Lulu, a [[List of Gilmore Girls characters#Stars Hollow|character in the TV series ''Gilmore Girls'']] * Lulu, a teddy bear in the TV series ''[[Bananas in Pyjamas]]'' * Lulu, a character in the TV series ''[[True Jackson, VP]]'' ==Popular music== * [[Lulu (singer)]] (born 1948), Scottish singer **{{anchor|Album}}[[Lulu (1973 album)|''Lulu'' (1973 album)]], an album by Lulu ** [[Lulu (1981 album)|''Lulu'' (1981 album)]], an album by Lulu * [[Lulu (Trip Shakespeare album)|''Lulu'' (Trip Shakespeare album)]], 1991 * [[Lulu (Lou Reed and Metallica album)|''Lulu'' (Lou Reed and Metallica album)]], 2011, based on the Wedekind plays ==Other== * [[Lulu (app)]], a mobile app that lets women rate men * [[Abu Muhammad Lu'lu' al-Kabir]] (died 1008/9), minister and emir of Aleppo * [[Lu Lu]] or Li Xiaolu (born 1982), Chinese actress * [[Paddy Roe]], Australian writer known as Lulu * [[Locally unwanted land use]] (LULU), a public-policy planning term * [[Mk 101 Lulu]], a nuclear depth charge formerly used by the United States * [[Lulu smoothing]], a non-linear mathematical smoothing technique ==See also== * [[Loulou (disambiguation)]] * ''[[Lulu on the Bridge]]'', a film by Paul Auster * {{intitle|Lulu}} {{Disambiguation}}
